front.title: •Tatooine: Tusken Canyon
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, Force drain +1 here (+2 if a Gaderffi Stick is present).  Light:

combo: Tatooine: Tusken Canyon + Tusken Raiders + Gaderffii Sticks + Darth Vader + Vader's Lightsaber This is a powerful combination. With four Raiders plus Vader, you have 16 power and a destiny draw, as well as a swipe with the Lightsaber. If your opponent threatens to kill Vader or one of the Raiders, simply knock away his weapon as quickly as possible. Add in Snipers to take care of Undercover spies, and you have a fairly stable Force drain.
